ShadowSiren:BluntDamage.NAME: Blunt
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deals #b50% more damage to targets with #yBlock.

ShadowSiren:ElectricDamage.NAME: Electric
ShadowSiren:ElectricDamage.DESCRIPTION: #yActivate this #yElement, imbuing your next Elementless Attack with #yElectric #yDamage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Arcs once when dealing unblocked damage, hitting a random enemy for #b50% of the damage dealt.

ShadowSiren:FireDamage.NAME: Fire
ShadowSiren:FireDamage.DESCRIPTION: #yActivate this #yElement, imbuing your next Elementless Attack with #yFire #yDamage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yBurned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.

ShadowSiren:IceDamage.NAME: Ice
ShadowSiren:IceDamage.DESCRIPTION: #yActivate this #yElement, imbuing your next Elementless Attack with #yIce #yDamage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yChilled creatures deal #b10% less damage with Attacks per #yChill this turn. NL At #b10 #yChill, the creature instead loses its turn.

ShadowSiren:ShadowDamage.NAME: Shadow
ShadowSiren:ShadowDamage.DESCRIPTION: #yActivate this #yElement, imbuing your next Elementless Attack with #yShadow #yDamage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yBlock and causes the target to lose HP equal to their #yShadow #ySplit.

ShadowSiren:IceBlock.NAME: Ice Shield [ShadowSiren:IceIcon]
ShadowSiren:IceBlock.DESCRIPTION: Attackers take damage equal to their #yChill.

ShadowSiren:StickyBlock.NAME: Sticky Block
ShadowSiren:StickyBlock.DESCRIPTION: Only reduced by #b1 at the start of turn.

ShadowSiren:ShadowBlock.NAME: Shadow Shield [ShadowSiren:DarkIcon]
ShadowSiren:ShadowBlock.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, applies 3 #yShadow #ySplit to the attacker.

ShadowSiren:ElectricBlock.NAME: Electric Shield [ShadowSiren:ElectricIcon]
ShadowSiren:ElectricBlock.DESCRIPTION: Applies #yShock to the attacker when this Block is damaged. Used #bbefore other Block types.
